metaData.label: Target ZERBAXA
metaData.criteriaDescription: My_Target_vod__C equal 1 AND ( Territory_vod__c begins with BR_T1A OR Territory_vod__c begins with BR_T1B OR Territory_vod__c begins with BR_T1C )

criteria.default_path_1: <FilterDefinition><ConditionSet Operator="AND" ConditionSetName="Individual Filter Grouping"><Condition Key="TSF_CRM_Profiles DMR.My_Target_vod__C" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"10fe9625-d0db-e911-a2d6-1402ec938a51"}"><AttributePath RelationshipID="c7da84c7-63fd-ec11-a31b-1402ec938a8d"><Value><![CDATA[1]]></Value></AttributePath></Condition><ConditionSet Operator="OR" ConditionSetName="Individual Filter Grouping"><Condition Key="TSF_CRM_Profiles DMR.Territory_vod__c" Operator="Begins" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"10fe9625-d0db-e911-a2d6-1402ec938a51"}"><AttributePath RelationshipID="c7da84c7-63fd-ec11-a31b-1402ec938a8d"><Value><![CDATA[BR_T1A]]></Value></AttributePath></Condition><Condition Key="TSF_CRM_Profiles DMR.Territory_vod__c" Operator="Begins" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"10fe9625-d0db-e911-a2d6-1402ec938a51"}"><AttributePath RelationshipID="c7da84c7-63fd-ec11-a31b-1402ec938a8d"><Value><![CDATA[BR_T1B]]></Value></AttributePath></Condition><Condition Key="TSF_CRM_Profiles DMR.Territory_vod__c" Operator="Begins" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"10fe9625-d0db-e911-a2d6-1402ec938a51"}"><AttributePath RelationshipID="c7da84c7-63fd-ec11-a31b-1402ec938a8d"><Value><![CDATA[BR_T1C]]></Value></AttributePath></Condition></ConditionSet></ConditionSet></FilterDefinition>
